name: Ffionaâ€™s Restaurant
address: 51 Kensington Church Street, London W8 4BA, United Kingdom
author: Casey W.
description:
- strongly recommend making reservations as the place is small and popular, 12 or less tables, intimate, walk ins welcome (but likely a wait)
- friendly staff 
- welsh lamb was cooked perfectly, well dressed and tender
- sirloin steak w/ a side of new potatoes was comfortable; something you'd make at home but without the effort of having to cook it yourself 
- daily menu changes (written on a blackboard), 
- we just missed the last order of scallops but they looked amazing
- will return during my next visit, would be a regular if I lived nearby
- farm to table
- apple berry crumble and eton mess were both enjoyable
